name: JOB HUNTING 9000

AHH YOUHAVE A SEXY GUARDIANANGELDEMONPRINCEROBOTVAMPIRESPIRITCREATUREBOYFRIENDTHING NOW IN THIS 20 OR SO MINUTE LONG (parody)VISUAL NOVEL OF A MILLENUEM WITH A TOTAL OF 7 DIFFERNT ENDINGS!!!!!!! this is for the yaoi game jam..Yeha....
its my first ever game and by extension my first renpy game and by extended extension my first gamejam!!! if its lackluster i do apologise...i would have added 29319498248 routes if i dearly couldve. Hm...maybe a definite edition would be in order... until then, im very tired skfjgjkfdjk
